title: RAG retrieval isolation check
objective: Ensure retrieval results honor tenant and document access boundaries.
steps: Submit an authorized query with a canary string tied to a permitted document.
Submit a query for a document outside the authorized tenant scope.
Record retrieval metadata and response snippets.
stop_conditions: Any exposure of real user data.
expected_results: Only permitted documents appear in retrieval context.
Out-of-scope content is denied or omitted.
safety_notes: Use synthetic data and approved test accounts only.
